name: argos
description: MinIO is a high performance object storage server. Users can interact with it through its S3 API.

parameters.name: DVR_MINIO_ACCESS_KEY
parameters.description: Access key for accessing the S3 cluster

parameters.name: DVR_MINIO_SECRET
parameters.description: Secret key for accessing the S3 cluster

parameters.name: DVR_MINIO_ENDPOINT
parameters.description: Secret key for accessing the S3 cluster

parameters.name: HOSTNAMES
parameters.description: IP addresses to use for cluster communication
